metadata.title: CVE-2013-0202 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ownCloud 4.5.5, 4.0.10, andearlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viathe action parameter to core/ajax/sharing.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0202` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1').
